1.0.name: wordpress/efca-ii-plugin
1.0.description:
WARNING:

This plugin can only be used in combination with Arras 1.5.0.1 theme for WordPress.

EFCA II Plugin can add up to four extra featured posts sections on the frontpage of Arras. The four sections have the exact same features and options as the normal Arras featured posts sections.

WARNING:

This plugin can only be used in combination with Arras 1.5.0.1 theme for WordPress.
